definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Filling is stuffing and fixing with slurry mixture of raw lacquer and fine gray gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 补灰就是用生漆和细石膏调和成浆状举办填密和修补。

sentences.english: Research condition of raw lacquer chemistry in our country was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文就我国生漆化学研究状况做了评述。

sentences.english: The effects of the different amounts of Pd C catalyst on the hydrogenation of raw lacquer were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同用量的钯炭催化剂对生漆催化氢化的影响。

sentences.english: Determination of adulterants in Chinese lacquer by pyrolysis gas chromatography is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了裂解气相色谱法鉴别中国生漆中的掺假物。

sentences.english: The general situation ot lacquer history in Guizhou province is simply discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文简要论述了贵州省生漆历史概况。

definition: tung oil, from the Japanese wood-oil tree Aleurites cordata, used in making lacquer
white wax from Chinese white wax bug (Ericerus pela)
to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
